cards.description: The Avatar component is used to represent a user, and displays the profile picture, initials or fallback icon.
cards.title: Avatar

cards.description: Buttons allow users to perform actions and choose with a single tap.
cards.title: Button

cards.description: If you need to make a group of buttons you can use the compound component Button.Group and inside the buttons you want to group.
cards.title: Button Group

cards.description: Card is a container for text, photos, and actions in the context of a single subject.
cards.title: Card

cards.description: The Pagination component allows you to display active page and navigate between multiple pages.
cards.title: Pagination

cards.description: Tables are used to display tabular data using rows and columns. They allow users to quickly scan, sort, compare, and take action on large amounts of data. Table implementation is based on @react-aria/table
cards.title: Table

cards.description: A responsive navigation header positioned on top side of your page that includes support for branding, links, navigation, collapse and more.
cards.title: Navbar

cards.description: Radios allow users to select a single option from a list of mutually exclusive options. All possible options are exposed up front for users to compare. Radio implementation is based on @react-aria/radio
cards.title: Radio

cards.description: Links allow users to click their way from page to page. This component is styled to resemble a hyperlink and semantically renders an <a>
cards.title: Link
